{"id":755935970,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1658718352,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/755935970/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"6 MB","code":"typedef long long int ll ;\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    \n    \n    double calpow(double base ,int power){\n        if(power  == 0)\n            return 1.0 ;\n        double half = calpow(base ,power/2);\n        if(power%2 == 0)\n            return half*half;\n        else\n            return half*half*base ;\n    }\n    \n    \n    \n    \n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n      ll N = n ;\n      if(N <0){\n          N = -N ;\n          x = 1/x ;\n      }\n        double ans = calpow(x,N);\n        return ans ;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
